title: Accountability
description: We own our responsibilities, acknowledge mistakes, and take corrective action without deflecting blame.

title: Adaptability
description: We flex and adjust as circumstances shift, finding opportunities in challenges.

title: Alignment
description: We ensure our individual efforts align with the team’s objectives for collective success.

title: Appreciation
description: We celebrate each other's successes and acknowledge the effort behind them.

title: Balance
description: We recognise the importance of balancing workloads with personal health and happiness.

title: Candour
description: We value constructive feedback and aren’t afraid to voice concerns in a respectful way.

title: Clarity
description: We avoid misunderstandings by being clear and precise in our communication.

title: Collaboration
description: We work together, leveraging each other's strengths to achieve more than we could individually.

title: Commitment
description: We dedicate ourselves fully to the team’s goals and consistently deliver on our promises.

title: Creativity
description: We embrace innovative thinking and encourage the team to explore new ideas and solutions.

title: Diversity
description: We value diverse perspectives and recognise the strength they bring to our decisions.

title: Empathy
description: We listen to understand and treat each other with kindness and compassion.

title: Empowerment
description: We trust each other to take ownership and make decisions that benefit the team.

title: Excellence
description: We strive for the highest standards in everything we do and inspire others to do the same.

title: Growth
description: We embrace challenges as opportunities to develop skills and grow as a team.

title: Honesty
description: We are truthful and transparent in all our interactions, building trust through integrity.

title: Inclusivity
description: We ensure everyone feels welcome, respected, and valued for their contributions.

title: Initiative
description: We take proactive steps to improve our team and processes without waiting to be asked.

title: Innovation
description: We challenge conventional thinking and explore creative ways to solve problems.

title: Integrity
description: We act in alignment with our values, even when it’s difficult or inconvenient.

title: Kindness
description: We treat each other with respect and encourage positive interactions in all our exchanges.

title: Leadership
description: We inspire others by taking responsibility and guiding the team towards success.

title: Learning
description: We constantly seek new knowledge and skills to improve ourselves and the team.

title: Openness
description: We share ideas, perspectives, and information freely, promoting collaboration.

title: Ownership
description: We take pride in our work and ensure we see tasks through to completion.

title: Perseverance
description: We stay resilient and determined, overcoming obstacles to achieve our goals.

title: Positivity
description: We foster an optimistic mindset and encourage each other to focus on solutions.

title: Quality
description: We prioritise doing things well, ensuring our work is effective and reliable.

title: Recognition
description: We celebrate each other's contributions and express gratitude for hard work.

title: Resilience
description: We bounce back from setbacks, learning and growing stronger with each challenge.

title: Respect
description: We value each other’s time, opinions, and efforts, fostering mutual trust and appreciation.

title: Safety
description: We create an environment where everyone feels comfortable to express themselves and take risks.

title: Support
description: We help one another succeed by offering guidance, encouragement, and assistance.

title: Teamwork
description: We collaborate as a unit, leveraging our collective strengths for better results.

title: Trust
description: We rely on one another to be dependable, honest, and supportive.
